Name: DR ELECTRON
Text: You and I make a good team, little guy.

Name: DR ELECTRON
Text: Now that we've blown the main generator, getting out of here will be a breeze.

Name: DR ELECTRON
Text: And, finally, my lifelong plans will be set in motion!

Name: DR ELECTRON
Text: I have been waiting for this day, little guy. The day that I am able to harness the power of an AI.

Name: DR ELECTRON
Text: I never knew if it was possible, but I know now. Using you, I can achieve anything!

Name: DR ELECTRON
Text: The world won't know what hit them. Doctor Electron, supreme ruler! I like that title.

Name: DR ELECTRON
Text: As for you, well, I don't think you're needed anymore.

Name: DR ELECTRON
Text: All I need to do is take your code and use it for other robots. Bigger, better, stronger robots!

Name: DR ELECTRON
Text: Thanks for helping me, but it's about time I turn you to scrap metal.
